description:
The Course is a simple answer to good looking and strong abdominal area. There is thousands of workouts and methods for Abdominals around. We will give you just six (6) workouts with some variations for progression. For every workout, you will get technique video and explanation. And the Best thing:

All information gave references on sports science and/or Instructor's experience as a Personal Trainer.

So all frustrating rumors and "super tricks" are left outside. Instead, we give answers and expand your knowledge:

  • Why should you train your Abdominals?
  • How should you train your Abdominals?
  • Which workouts really work? How to do them?
  • How often to train and for how long?
  • How to get rid of excess fat?
  • What means functionality of abdominals? Why is it important? How to improve it?
If you are interested even one of these, we recommend you to participate.

Course is for:

  • All people who have been trying to get good looking, visible and strong abdominals (Six-Pack)
  • For people who want to improve their knowledge of abdominal training
  • For all people, and especially athletes, who want to improve functionality of their abdominals

Requirements:

  • Access to Gym
  • Intermediate condition
  • 2-3 hours time / week

"Six Workouts for Six-Pack"
title: How You Should Train Your Abs: Get strong and visible core
